content.question: In 18th-century style music, the bass line of the first three chords most likely implies which of the following harmonies?

unit.text: 5: Harmony and Voice Leading II - Chord Progressions and Predominant Function

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply harmonic, melodic, and rhythmic procedures of 18th-century voice leading (up to 4 voices) in performed music.
